Notes.Text:
This update for shibboleth-sp fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-19191: Fixed escalation to root by fixing ownership of log files (bsc#1157471).

Vulnerabilities.Description: Shibboleth Service Provider (SP) 3.x before 3.1.0 shipped a spec file that calls chown on files in a directory controlled by the service user (the shibd account) after installation. This allows the user to escalate to root by pointing symlinks to files such as /etc/shadow.
